alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 11:36AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 1215 PM PDT... At 1136 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anza. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anza, Aguanga, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Cahuilla Indian Reservation and Sage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
